PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15562018-12-12,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of KATHERINE JEAN HAMBLY of Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 18, 2019, in the place of Mark Boudreau, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
